name: What the Hell?!?
description:
Made over the course of ~3 weeks for the CMPM 80K curriculum at UCSC.

A collaborative group project - team members are listed as authors; check them out!

This game is a pretty casual platformer, with basic mechanics that move you through levels of increasing difficulty. Fight your way through patrolling enemies to obtain a key to your exit while employing strategies to survive each round.
